author: Staff Reporter
text:
BJP celebrating the lifting of ban on jallikattu, in Salem on Friday.— PHOTO: E. LAKSHMI NARAYANAN

It was celebration time for the Bharatiya Janata Party cadre as their joy knew no bounds over lifting of ban on jallikattu.

Led by its district president Annadurai and general secretary R.P. Gopinath, cadre wore the mask of Prime Minister Narendra Modi and celebrated the Centre’s decision to allow the bull taming sport to be performed during the ensuing Pongal festival.

Efforts

They said that the traditional sport made the youth brave and strong on the field. It had been followed for many centuries.

They took out a bull on the road, and thanked the Prime Minister and also Union Minister Pon. Radhakrishnan for taking efforts in lifting the ban.

Sweets distributed

They distributed sweets to the public and said the decision to lift the ban had come as a Pongal gift to people of the State.

The sport is performed in Koolamedu in Attur taluk every year as it attracts large people and tourists from other States.
title: BJP celebrates lifting of ban on jallikattu
